summary: Completed comprehensive backend API testing for Y-Store Marketplace. All 7 critical APIs tested successfully with 100% pass rate. P2.1 partial backend refactor and P2.2 i18n system functioning correctly.

configuration_issues.issue: External preview URL not accessible - requires localhost testing

passed_tests: Backend health check - GET /api/health returns 200 with correct service name
Authentication login - POST /api/auth/login with admin credentials successful
Products API - GET /api/products returns products with proper structure
Catalog Facets API - GET /api/v2/catalog/facets returns categories, brands, and price ranges
Popular Categories API - GET /api/v2/catalog/popular-categories returns top categories with counts
Search Suggest API - GET /api/v2/search/suggest?q=iPhone returns relevant product suggestions
